name: node-ka-patch
description: A library for monkey-patch Node.js to force TCP keep-alive after socket.end()
readme:
node-ka-patch.js
================

Introduction
------------
A library for monkey-patch Node.js to force TCP keep-alive after `socket.end()`.

Installation
------------

    npm install node-ka-patch

Usage
-----

```javascript
require('node-ka-patch');
```
